Description_lang: Rushes at the enemy to inflict damage.
Heal's back line 50, but has a 2-turn cooldown

Bites the target, dealing [StandardDamage(1,1)] damage immediately, then [StandardDamage(2,1)] damage on the next round.

Lasts [numTurns()] |4round:rounds;.
